CPMAddPackage(
    NAME fmt
    GITHUB_REPOSITORY fmtlib/fmt # master
    GIT_TAG 2b6f7fc7a3f8c5322d8f0abce8b056e89e82e9ff
    EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL YES)

ph_add_library(
    NAME ph_vendor_fmt
    TYPE INTERFACE
    COMPILE_DEFINITIONS INTERFACE FMT_DEPRECATED_OSTREAM
    LINK_LIBRARIES SYSTEM INTERFACE fmt)
